constituent: steal, next, ice, lack, yawn, dish
koohiiStory1: You are so poor you dont know where your next dish will come from all you know is that you will have to steal it.
koohiiStory2: The first thing to steal is the silverware; next, the dishes.
words:
盗み(ぬすみ): stealing
強盗(ごうとう): robbery, burglary
盗難(とうなん): theft, robbery
盗む(ぬすむ): steal
